page.title: 12A COLEHILL MUM'S DAY.
page.content: My mum gets up in the morning at 7.30 a.m. to take me and my brother to school.Then she goes to work. She washes a lady's clothes and hoovers up then she makes the beds.She comes home at 10am. She goes to another work at Beaucroft School. She starts at l2 midday. She makes the dinner for the children, then she comes home at l. o'clock. She makes some dinner for herself then she comes and picks me and my brother up. We go home and have a rest. She makes our dinner. After she washes the dinner things up, we get ourselves washed and go to bed. At lO o'clock she picks Dad up and makes his dinner and then they watch television. Mum washes up the dinner things and then they go to bed. (NICOLA BEAMENT) Aged 9 years.
